page.title: 1525th Bolton Scouts - Lostock
page.content: The{Lostock scouts}meet every Wednesday and Friday night. They are divided into groups, the{Falcons}who meet on Fridays and the{Eagles}who meet on Wednesdays. I am a member of the Eagles troop. We meet at 7.30 pm and stand on{parade in uniform-}green beret and shirt, brown and orange neckerchief and grey trousers. We change into old clothes and play a game and then we work for one of the {badges listed in the handbook.}These cover a wide range of activities including{art, craft, photography, {swimming and canoeing.}When this period is over we change back into uniform and form{patrols.}We let down the{flag}and say a prayer before being dismissed. Finally we sweep up and roll up the flag ready for the Falcons on Friday.
